attributes.action: Return all illegal migrants back to France immediately.
attributes.additional_details:
1) Return all illegal migrants the same day to discourage them to return.
2) Publicly refuse asylum via law.
3) Setup a migrant prison to hold them in advance of departure, and stop using hotels as the expense of the tax payer. 
4) Sack Priti Patel effective immediately.

You give these non-economic contributing people more benefits and protection than our pensioners and ex servicemen. You should be ashamed
attributes.background: The government must return all illegal migrants crossing daily back to the shores of France from which they came. The U.K. has no obligation to those passing through a “safe” country. The U.K. cannot afford the economic costs of these people, whom are put up in 4* hotels and treated like royalty.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter the UK:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
